```{r, include=FALSE}

# set up -----------------------------

library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

source("W:\\RDA Team\\Packages\\rdaCharts\\HK\\R\\rdaBubblepop.R") # sourcing one of the visual files so I can get color codes

# library(devtools)
#  remotes::install_github("catalystcalifornia/rdaCharts") 
library(rdaCharts)
library(stringr)
library(htmltools) 
library(htmlwidgets)
# remotes::install_github("jthomasmock/gtExtras")
library(gtExtras)
library(gt)
library(extrafont)
library(usethis)

#connect to postgres

source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

con <- connect_to_db("eci_fresno_ripa")

# pull analysis tables for visualizing

df<-dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM report_traffic_result_citation_license_race")%>%
    mutate(statute_literal_25 = str_to_title(statute_literal_25))%>% # convert text for offense to be title case
  mutate(race_label=ifelse(race %in% "latinx", "Latinx",
                           ifelse(race %in% "nh_aian", "AIAN NH",
                                  ifelse(race %in% "nh_black", "Black",
                                         ifelse(race %in% "nh_multiracial", "Multiracial",
                                                ifelse(race %in% "nh_nhpi", "NHPI NH",
                                                       ifelse(race %in% "nh_sswana", "SSWANA NH",
                                                              ifelse(race %in% "nh_white", "White",
                                                              ifelse(race %in% "aiain_aoic", "AIAN",
                                                                     ifelse(race %in% "nhpia_aoic", "NHPI",
                                                                            ifelse(race %in% "sswana_aoic","SWANA/SA",
                                                                                   ifelse(race %in% 'nh_asian', "Asian", race))))))))))))%>%
  filter(race!="nh_sswana")%>%
  arrange(-rate)

# split up the df by the denominator options

df_result<-df%>%
  filter(denom=="citation_result")

df_race<-df%>%
  filter(denom=="citation_race") # I think this is the one we want to visualize

```

```{r, include=FALSE}

# visualize--------------------------

# create caption 

sourcenote<-"Catalyst California calculations based on City of Fresno's Police Stop Data (2022), catalystcalifornia.org, 2024. "

methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated traffic stops made by officers in 2022."

racenote <- "Race/ethnicity: AIAN=American Indian or Alaska Native, NHPI=Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander, SWANA/SA=Southwest Asian (Middle Eastern) or North African, or South Asian."

caption_text <- paste("<br>", racenote, sourcenote, methodnote)

# create tooltip text

tooltip_text <- "Out of 100 people Fresno PD stopped and percevied as <b>{point.race_label}</b> in an officer-initiated traffic stop that resulted in a <b>citation</b>, <b>{point.rate:.1f}%</b> of people were cited for <b>{point.statute_literal_25}</b>, or a total of <b>{point.count:.1f}</b> people."


# Run bubblechart function


chart<-rdaBubblepop(
  df_race,
  race_label,
  "rate",
  count,
  title = "Fresno PD Is Twice as Likely to Cite Perceived Latinx Drivers for Driving Without a License Compared to Perceived White Drivers",
  subtitle = "Rate of traffic stops that result in a citation for driving without a license",
  tooltip_text = tooltip_text,
  caption = caption_text,
  yaxis_label = "''",
  export_data_label = list(pointFormat='{point.rate:.1f}%') 
)

```
